name: Tic-Tac-Toe (vaibhavkr)
description:
Hey there, wanna play Tic-Tac-Toe?! Well, you have come to the right place..

You can play it with your friends, family or anyone you want, you can also play it with the in-built Artificial Intelligence of the game itself!

FEATURES:

  • Light and Dark Theme Available to Play
  • Can be Played with Friends or Family Members or Anyone You Want
  • Built-In Artificial Intelligence Support to Play in Singleplayer Mode

Thanks for Playing Tic-Tac-Toe :)
